text:
DocSend (San Francisco)

DocSend is a content management system that has both top-rated culture and a top-rated product.

We're looking for a Senior Software Engineer who wants influence on the product (both current and future!) and team.

Tech stack is Rails, JS/CoffeeScript, Heroku, Postgres.

Learn more about the job (and see DocSend in action) here: https://docsend.com/view/7vf3288

Or for the regular job description go here: https://jobs.lever.co/docsend/ebc75d63-fc3c-4329-aa30-975986...
